author: cnbc.com
title: Floor & Decor Holdings, Inc. Announces First Quarter Fiscal 2018 Earnings Conference Call
text:
ATLANTA--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Floor & Decor Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:FND) today announced that its financial results for the first quarter of fiscal 2018 will be released before market open on Thursday, May 3, 2018. The company at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time to discuss the financial results. A live audio webcast of the conference call, together with related materials, will be available online at ir.flooranddecor.com .
A recorded replay of the conference call will be available within two hours of the conclusion of the call and can be accessed both online at ir.flooranddecor.com and by dialing 844-512-2921 (international callers please dial 412-317-6671). The pin number to access the telephone replay is 13678318. The replay will be available until May 10, 2018.
About Floor & Decor Holdings, Inc.
Floor & Decor is a multi-channel specialty retailer of hard surface flooring and related accessories, offering a broad in-stock assortment of tile, wood, laminate and natural stone flooring along with decorative and installation accessories at everyday low prices.
